title: Stocks to Watch: What's Troubling the Market Now?
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Ben Levisohn discuss the impact of rising bond yields, Elon Musk's Twitter investment, the first-quarter earnings outlook, and bargains in banking and defense. Plus, the strangle logic behind stock splits.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
